snippet: Kirk Nieuwenhuis hit a leadoff homer and later connected for a two-run shot, and the Mets escaped a bases-loaded jam in the ninth to finish off a three-game sweep against Tampa Bay.
abstract: New York Mets defeat Tampa Bay Rays, 9-6, to complete a three-game sweep.
lead_paragraph: Kirk Nieuwenhuis hit a leadoff homer and later connected for a two-run shot, and the Mets escaped a bases-loaded jam in the ninth to finish off a three-game sweep against Tampa Bay.

headline.seo: Mets Complete Three-Game Sweep of Rays
headline.main: Mets Get Just Enough Hitting for Three-Game Sweep of Rays
headline.print_headline: Mets Get Just Enough Hitting For Three-Game Sweep of Rays
